Verses: 1 aabiragaam Avvidamvittu, Thendhesaththirkup Prayaanampanni, Kaadhesukkum Soorukkum Naduvaagak Kudiyeri, Keraarile Thanginaan.
2 ange Aabiragaam Than Manaiviyaagiya Saaraalaith Than Sagodhari Endru Sonnadhinaale, Keraarin Raajaavaagiya Abimelekku Aal Anuppi Saaraalai Azhaippiththaan.
3 dhevan Iravile Abimelekkukku Soppanaththile Thondri: Nee Azhaippiththa Sthreeyinnimiththam Nee Seththaai; Aval Oruvanudaiya Manaiviyaayirukkiraale Endraar.
4 abimelekku Avalai Seraadhirundhaan. Aagaiyaal Avan: Aandavare, Needhiyulla Janangalai Azhippeero?
5 ival Than Sagodhari Endru Avan Ennode Sollavillaiyaa? Avan Than Sagodharan Endru Ivalum Sonnaale; Uththama Irudhayaththodum Suththamaana Kaigalodum Idhai Seydhen Endru Sonnaan.

6 appozhudhu Dhevan: Uththama Irudhayaththode Nee Idhai Seydhaai Endru Naan Arindhirukkiren; Nee Enakku Virodhamaagap Paavam Seyyaadhapadikku Unnaith Thaduththen; Aagaiyaal, Nee Avalaith Thoda Naan Unakku Idankodukkavillai.

7 andha Manushanudaiya Manaiviyai Avanidaththirku Anuppividu; Avan Oru Theerkkadharisi; Nee Pizhaikkumpadikku Avan Unakkaaga Vendudhal Seyvaan; Nee Avalai Anuppividaadhirundhaal, Neeyum Unnai Serndha Yaavarum Saagave Saaveergal Endru Arivaayaaga Endru Soppanaththile Avanukku Sonnaar.
8 abimelekku Adhikaalaiyil Ezhundhu, Than Oozhiyakkaararaiyellaam Azhaippiththu, Indha Sangadhigalaiyellaam Avargal Ketkumpadi Sonnaan; Andha Manushar Migavum Bayandhaargal.

9 appozhudhu Abimelekku Aabiragaamai Azhaippiththu; Nee Engalukku Enna Kaariyancheydhaai, Nee Enmelum, En Raajyaththinmelum Kodiya Paavam Sumarappannugiradharku Unakku Naan Enna Kutram Seydhen? Seyyaththagaadha Kaariyangalai Ennidaththil Seydhaaye Endraan.
10 pinnum Abimelekku Aabiragaamai Nokki: Ennaththaik Kandu Nee Indhak Kaariyaththai Seydhaai Endraan.
11 adharku Aabiragaam: Ivvidaththil Theyvabayam Illaiyendrum, En Manaiviyinimiththam Ennaik Kondrupoduvaargal Endrum Naan Ninaiththen.
12 aval En Sagodhari Enbadhum Meydhaan; Aval En Thagappanukkuk Kumaaraththi, En Thaaikkuk Kumaaraththiyalla; Aval Enakku Manaiviyaanaal.

13 en Thagappan Veettaivittu Dhevan Ennai Dhesaandhariyaaith Thiriyumpadi Seydhapodhu, Naan Avalai Nokki: Naam Pogum Idamengum, Nee Ennai Sagodharan Endru Solvadhu Nee Enakku Seyyavendiya Dhayai Endru Avalidaththil Solliyirundhen Endraan
14 appozhudhu Abimelekku Aadu Maadugalaiyum, Velaikkaararaiyum, Velaikkaarigalaiyum Aabiragaamukkuk Koduththu, Avan Manaiviyaagiya Saaraalaiyum Avanidaththil Thirumba Oppuviththaan.
15 pinnum Abimelekku: Idho, En Dhesam Unakku Munbaaga Irukkiradhu; Un Paarvaikku Sammadhiyaana Idaththile Kudiyiru Endru Sonnaan.

16 pinbu Saaraalai Nokki: Un Sagodharanukku Aayiram Vellikkaasu Koduththen; Idho, Unnodirukkira Ellaar Munbaagavum, Matra Yaavar Munbaagavum, Idhu Un Mugaththu Mukkaattukkaavadhaaga Endraan; Ippadi Aval Kadindhu Kollappattaal.
17 aabiragaamudaiya Manaiviyaagiya Saaraalinnimiththam Karththar Abimelekkudaiya Veettaarin Garppangalaiyellaam Adaiththirundhapadiyaal,
18 aabiragaam Dhevanai Nokki Vendikkondaan; Appozhudhu Dhevan Abimelekkaiyum, Avan Manaiviyaiyum, Avan Velaikkaarigalaiyum Gunamaakki, Pillaiperumpadi Anukkiragampanninaar.
